note:
Old Ohioan interested in everything, especially the future.
Tooting with humor and olfactory overtones.
Prefer deep discussions, including the physics of weather and civil war.
Melanin deficient (M-) and left hand positive (LH+}.

Why Stegosaurus? My spirit animal has seen a lot and has thick skin. We're dedicated to fighting evil.
To fight racism, we must define it as: Anything that promotes the idea that there is more than one race among humans.
And yes, I love salad.

fields.name: Behavior
fields.value: Everything from Dinosaurs to Dog Training
